T02D3707:13b-10: de bas na mu stegs pa'i lta ba nyid dang
T02D3707:13b-11: 'di'i don rtogs pa gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D3707:13b-12: theg pa chen po'i gzhung rgyas pa ni don med
T02D3707:13b-14: de ni khyed lta bu'i bdag nyid dgra bcom pa
T02D3707:13b-15: rnams la khyad par med pas don med pa ni
T02D3707:13b-16: bden mod kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /
T02D3707:13b-17: mu stegs kyi tshul las theg pa chen po'i khyad par gang yin pa de brjod par bya'o //
T02D3707:13b-18: smon lam dang ni 'jug pa dang //
T02D3707:13b-19: de bzhin zab dang rgya che nyid //
T02D3707:13b-20: mi ldog 'bras bu thob pas kyang //
T02D3707:13b-21: theg pa chen po khyad par 'phags //
T02D3707:13b-22: smon lam la sogs pa 'di dag kyang gong nas
T02D3707:13b-23: gong du rgyur gyur pas bla na med pa'i bde
T02D3707:13b-24: bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D3707:13b-25: bya ba ni / theg pa chen po'i don yin la /
T02D3707:13b-26: don 'di ni gzhan gang du yang ma thos na
T02D3707:13b-27: ci'i phyir theg pa chen po'i gzhung rgyas pa la
T02D3707:13b-29: de la dang po de'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams ni /
T02D3707:13b-30: smon lam bla na med pa de lta bu gang
T02D3707:13b-31: yin pa de nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T02D3707:13b-32: rgyas pa ltar lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyis
T02D3707:13b-33: mchod pa dang / dang po sems bskyed pa nyid
T02D3707:13b-34: na bdag nyid chen po de rnams mtha' yas pa
T02D3707:13b-35: la bar chad med par 'jug cing /
T02D3707:13b-36: bde bar gshegs pa ma lus pa'i yon tan gyi
T02D3707:13b-37: sa bon du gyur pa de lta bu'i yang dag
T02D3707:13b-38: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa bzhin du lha'i
T02D3707:13b-39: rgyal po la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa
T02D3707:13b-40: dang / bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang spyan ras kyis 'tsho ba dang /
T02D3707:13b-41: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba yin te /
T02D3707:13b-42: rgya cher bshad pa ci zhig bya ste /
T02D3707:13b-43: bla na med pa thob pa'i thabs la rab tu
T02D3707:13b-44: gnas pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra
T02D3707:13b-45: bar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni 'gro ba
T02D3707:13b-46: rnams dbugs 'phyin pa'i rgyu yin te /
T02D3707:14a-2: 'khor ba'i tha ma med pa yi //
T02D3707:14a-3: sngon gyi tha ma ji srid pa //
T02D3707:14a-4: de srid sems can phan don du //
T02D3707:14a-5: spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bgyi //
T02D3707:14a-6: zhes bya ba lta bu dang /
T02D3707:14a-7: rje btsun rin chen sgron ma las kyang /
T02D3707:14a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i gnas skabs su 'di dag gsal bar bstan pa dang /
T02D3707:14a-9: bzang po spyod pa la sogs par yang bshad pa yin te /
T02D3707:14a-10: 'di dag ni re zhig thag pa chen po la
T02D3707:14a-11: zhugs pa'i bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi smon lam
T02D3707:14a-13: bdag gi lus dang longs spyod dang //
T02D3707:14a-14: dge ba dus gsum skyes pa rnams //
T02D3707:14a-15: sems can kun la btang ba dang //
T02D3707:14a-16: de bsrung dag pa spel ba'o //
T02D3707:14a-17: zhes bshad pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jug pa yang 'di yin te /
T02D3707:14a-18: sems can thams cad la bdag nyid kyi dngos po rnams sbyin pa dang /
T02D3707:14a-19: byin nas kyang bsrung ba gang yin pa'o //
T02D3707:14a-20: ji ltar na byin pa bsrung bar bya zhe na /
T02D3707:14a-22: sems can ma lus pas yongs su longs spyad pa'i
T02D3707:14a-23: don nyid du bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad
T02D3707:14a-24: byin la de yang gang gi tshe ji zhig ltar
T02D3707:14a-25: btang bas sems can thams cad kyis nye bar longs
T02D3707:14a-26: spyod par mi 'gyur bas bran ltar bdag pos nye
T02D3707:14a-27: bar longs spyod pa'i don du bdag nyid kyi dngos
T02D3707:14a-28: po rnams srung par byed pa la nyes pa med
T02D3707:14a-30: sems can rnams kyi longs spyod phyir //
T02D3707:14a-31: lus la sogs pa sbyin par bya //
T02D3707:14a-32: ma bsrungs longs spyod ga las 'ongs //
T02D3707:14a-33: gang mi spyod pa ci zhig sbyin //
T02D3707:14a-34: de bas sems can longs spyod phyir //
T02D3707:14a-35: lus la sogs pa bsrung bar bya //
T02D3707:14a-37: de bzhin du bsrung ba yang bdag po nyid kyi don du dag par bya ste /
T02D3707:14a-38: tshul khrims la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i bdag
T02D3707:14a-39: nyid kyis dngos pos bdag po sems can ma lus
T02D3707:14a-40: pa'i don rdzogs par 'gyur bas sbyang bar rigs pa
T02D3707:14a-41: yin no // dag pa yang bdag po'i don nyid du 'phel bar bya'o //
T02D3707:14a-42: bran yang 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs par skyes par gyur pas /
T02D3707:14a-43: bdag po sems can rnams kyis 'di dang pha rol
T02D3707:14a-44: gyi don de 'grub pa yin par rigs pa nyid
T02D3707:14a-45: yin no // de bzhin du longs spyod dang dus
T02D3707:14b-0: @14b gsum du gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
T02D3707:14b-4: 'phel ba rnams shes par bya ste /
T02D3707:14b-5: don 'di ni bslab ba kun las btus par gsal bar byas pas 'dir rgya cher ma spros so //
T02D3707:14b-6: 'jug pa yang thabs la mkhas pa 'di dang rjes su 'brel ba yin no //
T02D3707:14b-7: sems can la dmigs snying rje gang //
T02D3707:14b-8: 'jug tshe chos nyid la gnas pa //
T02D3707:14b-9: de ni dmigs med nyid thob pas //
T02D3707:14b-10: zab cing rgya che nyid du 'gro / byang chub
T02D3707:14b-11: sems dpa' tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi yongs su rdzogs pas
T02D3707:14b-12: sdug bsngal gsum gyis zin pa'i sems can gyi khams
T02D3707:14b-13: la dmigs pa na sems can ma lus pa la
T02D3707:14b-14: dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po stobs can 'byung bar
T02D3707:14b-15: 'gyur la / snying rje chen po des sems can
T02D3707:14b-16: rnams la dmigs nas sbyin pa la sogs pa la
T02D3707:14b-17: 'jug pa ni ji srid shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D3707:14b-18: tu phyin pa la gnas par ma gyur pa de
T02D3707:14b-20: sbyin pa la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3707:14b-21: de'i gnas skabs su ni sbyin ba chen po la
T02D3707:14b-22: sogs pa yongs su dag pa'i sgo nas de yang
T02D3707:14b-23: mi dmigs pa'i sbyor bas yongs su dag par 'gyur
T02D3707:14b-24: bas de ni de'i chos la dmigs par gyur pa'i
T02D3707:14b-25: snying rje skyes par gyur pa yin no //
T02D3707:14b-26: de ltar bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du chos
T02D3707:14b-27: la dmigs pa'i snying rje goms par byas pa yongs
T02D3707:14b-28: su rdzogs pa la dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje
T02D3707:14b-30: 'di ni de'i zab pa dang rgya che ba yin
T02D3707:14b-31: pas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i khyad par ro
T02D3707:14b-32: // mtha' yas pa dang 'bar ba yi //
T02D3707:14b-33: smon lam sogs kyis de nyid du //
T02D3707:14b-34: ro gcig chos dbyings nyid thob nas //
T02D3707:14b-35: slar yang ldog par ji ltar 'gyur //
T02D3707:14b-36: mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams gdon pa'i bsam pas mtha' yas pa'i smon lam dang /
T02D3707:14b-38: ji ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang 'dra ste /
T02D3707:14b-39: de ni thams cad zab cing rgya che ba'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid du spyod la /
T02D3707:14b-40: de dag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D3707:14b-41: pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtha' yas ba'i brtson 'grus
T02D3707:14b-42: 'bar ba dang / smon pa dang 'jug pa la
T02D3707:14b-43: sogs pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi dbyings
T02D3707:15a-0: 'bar ba dang / nyid rtogs la / phun @15a * //
T02D3707:15a-1: sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa thob pa dang stobs
T02D3707:15a-2: mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i phyin ci ma log
T02D3707:15a-3: pa'i rgyu'i stobs kyis na ldog par 'os pa ma
T02D3707:15a-4: yin pas na mi rtog pa'i rgyu'i khyad par yin
T02D3707:15a-5: no // kun dga' mi zad snang ba dang //
T02D3707:15a-6: sna tshogs rang bzhin mi rtog pa //
T02D3707:15a-7: snying rje chen po'i ro yis khyab //
T02D3707:15a-8: chos dbyings bdag nyid can 'bras bu //
T02D3707:15a-9: gang de mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba can /
T02D3707:15a-10: mi zad pa sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid can rnam
T02D3707:15a-11: par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang gi
T02D3707:15a-12: ngo bo nyid de ni smon lam la sogs pa
T02D3707:15a-13: ma lus pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
T02D3707:15a-14: de la snying rje chen po'i shugs kyi dbang gis
T02D3707:15a-15: lhun gyis grub cing rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug la
T02D3707:15a-16: / gzhan gyi bya ba ma lus pa rjes su
T02D3707:15a-17: bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid can mtha' yas pa'i byang chub
T02D3707:15a-18: kyi rtsis khyab pa mi zad pa'i gser gyi gter
T02D3707:15a-19: / lta bu'o // gnas 'di ni thams cad mkhyen
T02D3707:15a-20: pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can thams cad la
T02D3707:15a-21: phan par mdzad pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos
T02D3707:15a-22: kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ji ji skad du
T02D3707:15a-23: bshad pa'i rgyug zhan las 'byung bar ni mi rigs
T02D3707:15a-24: kyi phyin ci ma log pa'i thabs kyi zhing dam
T02D3707:15a-26: gzhan gyi dgos pa'i don du smon lam gyi sa
T02D3707:15a-27: bon dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'dus byas pas mi
T02D3707:15a-28: ldog pa'i chos can 'gro ba la phan par byed
T02D3707:15a-29: pa'i gnas bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang du 'gyur
T02D3707:15a-30: ba ni rigs pa nyid yin te /
T02D3707:15a-31: 'bras bu ni rgyu dang mthun pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3707:15a-32: de bas na bla na med pa'i go 'phang 'thob
T02D3707:15a-33: pa'i rgyu smon lam la sogs pa ni theg pa
T02D3707:15a-34: chen po nyid du ston na ci'i phyir theg pa
T02D3707:15a-35: chen po'i gzhung rgyas pa don med pa yin /
T02D3707:15a-37: 'du shes med pa'i sbyor ba dang //
T02D3707:15a-38: sa bon med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02D3707:15a-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming gis mu stegs pa rnams ston la /
T02D3707:15a-40: de ni 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid la de ltar bshad de /
T02D3707:15a-41: de nyid ni sems kyi 'jug pa'i 'du shes ma
T02D3707:15a-42: lus pa las ldog pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i
T02D3707:15a-43: phyir ro // de yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa can yin la /
T02D3707:15a-44: bsam gtan bzhi pa nyid las 'bras bu che pa'i
T02D3707:15a-45: phyogs gcig na 'du shes med pa'i sems can du
T02D3707:15a-46: skye la 'du shes med pa ni de'i 'bras bu
T02D3707:15a-47: yin no // de nyid kyang shin tu rmongs shing
T02D3707:15b-0: @15b dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma bsten pas mya ngan
T02D3707:15b-1: las 'das pa'i 'du shes kyis snyoms par 'jug la
T02D3707:15b-2: yin no // / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar
T02D3707:15b-3: 'gyur ba'i las mngon du phyogs par gyur pa gang
T02D3707:15b-4: yin pa des ni slar yang dmyal ba dang /
T02D3707:15b-6: dud 'gro skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di la ni /
T02D3707:15b-7: sa bon med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02D3707:15b-8: ces bya ba'i ming du btags par rigs pa nyid yin te /
T02D3707:15b-9: thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang 'thob pa'i rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D3707:15b-10: 'dir byis pa'i rtsed mo'i tshul gyi 'bras bu brtags pa ni des chog go //
T02D3707:15b-11: de yang rig byed kyi mthar smra ba dang /
T02D3707:15b-14: gcer bu pa la sogs pa'i gzhung dman pa /
T02D3707:15b-15: brdzun pa'i blo can don dam pa ma rtogs pa
T02D3707:15b-16: bdag tu lta ba la mngon par zhen bas sems
T02D3707:15b-17: la ril por 'dzin pa brtan par byed pa /
T02D3707:15b-18: 'dul ba'i dus la ma bab na /
T02D3707:15b-19: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang btang snyoms su bzhag pa /
T02D3707:15b-20: 'khor ba'i mdud pa slar yang dam po nyid du
T02D3707:15b-21: byed pa rnams la ni snying rjes brgyan pa rnams
T02D3707:15b-22: kyis rgud pa la 'jug pa rnams la snying brtse
T02D3707:15b-23: bar bya ba yin gyi zhe sdang bar 'os pa
T02D3707:15b-25: gang yang bde bar gshegs pa'i tshul can phyin ci
T02D3707:15b-26: ma log pa'i blos 'khor ba dang mya ngan las
T02D3707:15b-27: 'das pa'i phyogs rtogs pa la mkhas pa de la
T02D3707:15b-28: ni ngan par bshad pa'i grub pa'i mtha'i rjes su
T02D3707:15b-29: 'gro ba'i blo can gyis bskyod par nus pa ma
T02D3707:15b-30: yin no // de ltar na tshangs pa la sogs
T02D3707:15b-31: pa'i lta ba las theg pa chen po'i don gyi
T02D3707:15b-32: khyad par shin tu mang ba yang gdul bya'i bsam
T02D3707:15b-33: pa mang ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3707:15b-34: 'di ltar nyon mongs pas bcings pa thams cad ni /
T02D3707:15b-35: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje'i gnas yin te /
T02D3707:15b-36: de yang sems kyi spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir /
T02D3707:15b-37: thabs kyi tshul mtha' yas pas 'dul ba yin pas
T02D3707:15b-38: sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas shing
T02D3707:15b-39: sna tshogs pa kho nar rigs pa nyid yin no
T02D3707:15b-40: // de bas na thar pa'i lam la gus pas spro bar gyur pa yin zhing /
T02D3707:15b-41: dbang po'i khyad par gyis myur ba dang ring ba dang /
T02D3707:15b-42: shin tu ring ba nyid du rnam par grol ba'i skal ba can yin pas /
T02D3707:16a-1: lung bstan pa'i don phan tshun rnam par dpyod pa
T02D3707:16a-2: ni mdzes kyis shin tu dman pa'i blo can lta
T02D3707:16a-3: ba ngan pa'i mes rgyud tshig pa bde ba'i lam
T02D3707:16a-4: las shin tu ring zhing yongs su nyams pa dang
T02D3707:16a-5: / dmus long 'o ma'i yon tan dkar po la
T02D3707:16a-6: sogs pa yongs su rtog par byed pa dang 'dra
T02D3707:16a-7: ba gzhan dag dang theg pa chen po yongs su
T02D3707:16a-9: 'dir brgal ba gal te bla na med pa'i byang
T02D3707:16a-10: chub kyi 'bras bu'i rgyu'i tshogs ni smon lam la
T02D3707:16a-11: sogs pa yin par pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
T02D3707:16a-12: las ston la / de ltar na smon lam la
T02D3707:16a-13: sogs pa ni mi 'pho ba'i gnas thob pa'i rgyur
T02D3707:16a-14: gyur pa nyid yin pas gsang sngags kyi theg pa
T02D3707:16a-15: chen po bstan pas ci zhig bya /
T02D3707:16a-16: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de yang byams pa
T02D3707:16a-17: dang snying rje la sogs pa ma lus pa goms
T02D3707:16a-18: par byas pa'i rab kyi mthar thug pa nyid dang
T02D3707:16a-19: / des kun nas slong ba'i sbyin pa dang /
T02D3707:16a-20: tshul khrims la sogs pa las 'byung ba yin no //
T02D3707:16a-21: gsang sngags kyi tshul las ni phal cher de dang 'gal ba'i bya ba rnams kun du ston te /
T02D3707:16a-23: mngon spyod la sogs pa'i las rnams ni 'dod chags
T02D3707:16a-24: la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir byams pas
T02D3707:16a-25: kun nas slong ba ma yin la /
T02D3707:16a-26: 'dod chags la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i
T02D3707:16a-27: las rnams las ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar bcom ldan
T02D3707:16a-29: dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa las /
T02D3707:16a-30: 'dod chags kyis ni gdungs pa rnams //
T02D3707:16a-31: ngang pa phug ron la sogs dang //
T02D3707:16a-32: bong bu 'dod chags can rnams kyis //
T02D3707:16a-33: skye gnas sngon sogs skye gnas skye //
T02D3707:16a-36: bza' ba ma yin pa la sogs pa'i bya ba
T02D3707:16a-37: ston pa de ni rnam par mkhas pa dang bral
T02D3707:16a-38: ba'i 'khor ba pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags pa ma
T02D3707:16a-39: yin na ji ltar 'gro ba ma lus pa la
T02D3707:16a-40: bu gcig pa ltar sems pa'i snying rje chen po
T02D3707:16a-41: dang ldan pa rnams de la 'jug par 'gyur /
T02D3707:16a-42: 'jug tu zin kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
T02D3707:16a-43: par mi 'gyur bas sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin
T02D3707:16a-44: pa sgrin pos sbyar ba lta bur shes so zhe
T02D3707:16b-0: na / @16b rtogs pa'i tshig ma yin pa ni bden mod kyi /
T02D3707:16b-1: 'on kyang de lta bu zhes pas gsal la /
T02D3707:16b-2: nyid ces bya ba 'dir gzhug par bya ste /
T02D3707:16b-3: 'di ni ma rtogs pa'i tshig yin pa nyid kyis
T02D3707:16b-4: na bdag cag rnams kyis brgal ba yin no zhes
T02D3707:16b-5: brjod par bya'o // de yang rtogs par 'gyur ba
T02D3707:16b-6: rnams ni sngags kyi theg pa chen po'i snying po'i
T02D3707:16b-7: don ma shes nas 'di ltar de spong bar rgol
T02D3707:16b-8: bas bdag nyid phung khrol chen po nyid la sbyor
T02D3707:16b-10: gsang sngags kyi theg pa chen po ni bdag nyid
T02D3707:16b-11: che ba nyid de'i rigs can gyis blo phyin ci
T02D3707:16b-12: ma log pa'i sems dang ldan pa la /
T02D3707:16b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par gyi rgyu nyid du ston par mdzad de /
T02D3707:16b-14: de yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen
T02D3707:16b-15: po dang don gcig pa las de'i khyad par gang
T02D3707:16b-16: dag yod pa de brjod par bya'o //
T02D3707:16b-17: don gcig nyid na'ang ma rmongs dang //
T02D3707:16b-18: thabs mang dka' ba med phyir dang //
T02D3707:16b-19: dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas bas //
T02D3707:16b-20: sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags //
T02D3707:16b-21: 'di ltar gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa thams cad
T02D3707:16b-22: mkhyen par bshad pa'i 'bras bu ni sngags dang pha
